body_html: @yuanbyu @ffmpbgrnn I'm having a similar problem and am getting tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.InvalidArgumentError: The node 'update_barrier' has inputs from different frames. The input 'while/BatchNorm/AssignMovingAvg_1' is in frame 'while/while/'. The input 'fc1/BatchNorm/AssignMovingAvg_1' is in frame ''. Is there a way to use batch-norm inside tf.while_loop?

body: @yuanbyu @ffmpbgrnn I'm having a similar problem and am getting `tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.InvalidArgumentError: The node 'update_barrier' has inputs from different frames. The input 'while/BatchNorm/AssignMovingAvg_1' is in frame 'while/while/'. The input 'fc1/BatchNorm/AssignMovingAvg_1' is in frame '`'. Is there a way to use batch-norm inside `tf.while_loop`?
